message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but the value of this product is truly above $90. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
